pages.text: Mysterious shades that summon flames upon their target's feet that, rather being hot, freezes the soul. They also have the ability to teleport but only do so if their target is near them.
Despite their fiery powers, they are not immune to fire.

pages.title: Ectoplasm
pages.text: Wraiths have a chance of dropping an Ectoplasm. The Ectoplasm is useful for crafting Necroturgic artifacts and spells.

A variant of the wraith, these phantasms lack the ability to teleport and summon less Ice Bouquets than their cousin. However, they have the power to breath their icy flames upon their target, if said target goes close to them.
